Description
This mod adds "Need Water" to pawns. There are various means to get and transport water, such as: wells, pumps, water pipes, faucets, water cleaners, and more. This mod should NOT be applied to saved games.

Update: Mar 16 This is an update for compatibility with Rimworld 1.1. The dependency on Modcheck was removed due to the delay in updating it for 1.1. Any pre-existing bugs with the mod likely still exist.
Other changes: Sounds have been updated to use custom sounds instead of the built-in sounds.
Known issues: -The sound for drawing water is still using the built-in sound for cooking. -Not adding enough water to a caravan does not produce a warning.
Please refer to the 1.0 mod for FAQs and other information:
